name: ooOooOOOo
description:
Watch the cauldron: https://goo.gl/5Bwdcc.

A spOOoOOoooOky kind of puzzle game starring a ghost made for the 2016 Global Game Jam by Chris Ng and Michael Lee. With wit and just trying over and over again until you hate us, you'll discover how the "game" is never bounded by the world it was created in.

WASD to move.
